titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1927 WEAVER Nov. 16 Miss A. F. Weaver Audrey F. Chez Mme Belloc 42 rue Perronet Reuilly sur Seine
3 m 2 vols 85 Deposit 100 Refunded
Nov 16 Kitty 0.25 Nov 21 New Wine 0.25 2.50 due " 21 " 21 Lost Estay 0.25 " 23 " " Canary Murder Cae 0.25 " 23 " 23 Hureotts. " 25 " 23 Crime of Man. " 25 " 25 Farrington Diary 0.50 Nov 30 " 25 Sementimentalism 0.25 3.75 " " " 30 Grandmoths due Dec 2 " 30 Red Sky at Morning 11f " 2 Dec 2 Mad Crews 0.25 Dec 7 " " Cabala " " Dec 7 Bridge of San Luis Rey Dec 13 " " Jeremy at Crale " 13 " 13 My Heart & My Flesh " 19 " 13 Flamingo " 19 19 Tinker's Leave " 22 19 Mr. Charles " 22 22 Transition (Muir) (copy to be put away) " 22 Letters of Gertrude Bell v 1
1928 subs to Feb. 16th. 28 WEAVER
Dec. 22 Place called Dagon. Dec 28 " 28 Letters of G. Bell vol II 26 Jan 3 " 28 Oriental Encounters. Dec 31 " 31 Are They the Same at Home Jan 3 Jan 3 Right off the Map Jan 3 Chinaman's Opinion of Us. Janv. 6. 6 Right to be happy. = 2.75 Jan 10 Jan 10 Blue Voyage Jan 14 " " Lawrence & the Arab Jan 14 Jan 14 Men Without Women " 18 My Journey to Lhasa " 18 " 18 Vestal Fire " 27 " 18 Conquistador 4.50 " 27 " 27 Many Latitudes 0.25 " 39 " 27 Beyond the Khyber Pass " 30 " 30 Father India " 31 " 30 Case of Bevan Yorke owes 0.50 " 31 " 31 Flat no 2 " Feb 3 " 31 Catherine the Great " " Feb 3
